name: carbon-management-system-full
description: Carbon management system with separated frontend and backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run gulp build
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run gulp serve
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
